resources.string: This application (for health professionnals only) allow you to ask questions about the condition of a patient\'s knee. At the end of these questions, a score is calculated and recommendations are given on what action(s) to take.
Click the button below to start a new evaluation
Entered data are never saved on the device or on a server. You will however be allowed to send the final score via e-mail.
Icon of the French Arthroscopia Association
Please answer the question to continue.
Veuillez appuyer sur le bouton Déconnexion afin de revenir à l\'écran précédent.
By continuing on this application, you commit to be a health professionnal.
Please note that the following information will be included in the result file you will be able to send by e-mail. The data will be deleted from the application after sending
You can choose to save the e-mail address on your device to avoid having to fill it in for each test.
Please fill all required fields to generate the PDF.
This document is NOT a medical diagnosis.
To secure data exchange, a password is required. The same password will be requested when opening the document on another device.
Minor knee trauma. An appointment at a doctor is recommended. No MRI necessary.
Moderate knee trauma. A MRI is recommended with an appointment at an orthopedic surgeon or a sports doctor.
Severe knee trauma. It is recommended to have a MRI as soon as possible as well as an appointment at an orthopedic surgeon.
This test has been designed for adult patients and can be less relevant for children.
